I believe someone mentioned this sometime back so this
is just a reminder that, "Japan: Memoirs of a Secret
Empire" a 3 hour special will be shown tonight
(Wednesday, May 26) on many pbs stations. It looks
like it will cover the whole Tokugawa era. Click the
second link to see if you get it in your area:

http://www.pbs.org/empires/japan/theprogram.html

http://www.pbs.org/empires/japan/program_6.html

Enjoy,

Kevin
